issue.title: [CF 763] Showing icon of dispelled aura
issue.body:
^1^T^SType^Scleu ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SAnimations ^SDuration^N0.7 ^SAnimation^SICONALPHAFLASH ^SEvent^SOnShow ^SPeriod^N0.7 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SDestUnit^Starget ^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_DISPEL^B ^t^SEnabled^B ^SDestFlags^N4294967279 ^SCLEUDur^N0.7 ^t^N61501^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Hello, I want the icon of the magic buff I just purged to be shown. This worked before 5.2 but somehow in 5.2 it's showing the purge icon instead of the icon of the aura that I dispelled. Events to check: dispel. I tried any other but none of them gave the result I wanted. Any ideas?


> Posted by CurseForge user daniel1992 | Imported from CurseForge issue #763 | Raw

comments.body:
This is a blizzard bug introduced in 5.2 (see http://us.battle.net/wow/en/forum/topic/6413023639)

I know you said you tried other events, but did you try the other dispel event? There are two of them - I'm guessing you did try it, but I just wanted to be sure.

If that doesn't work, then you will just have to wait until Blizzard fixes this bug with a bugfix patch, probably in a week or two.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Blizzard has fixed in this 5.3


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
